Name: 和气生财
Description: 获得{0}点护盾，结束你的回合。获得{1}金币。
Description_en: Gain {0} shield and end your turn. Gain {1} gold.

Name: 点石成金
Description:
燃烬你的所有手卡，每张获得一点超魔，30金币。
超魔2： 对敌人造成8点伤害。
超魔4：获得1～3点能量，抽1～4张牌。
超魔6：以上效果额外触发一次。
Description_en:
Burnout all cards in your hand to gain 1 Super Magic for each card, and 30 gold.
Super Magic 2: Deal 8 damage to enemies.
Super Magic 4: Gain 1-3 energy and draw 1-4 cards.
Super Magic 6: Trigger the above effect once more.

Name: 赢家通吃
Description:
每有100点金币，获得一点超魔。
超魔X：消耗50金币，对全体敌人造成5点伤害。
Description_en:
Gain 1 Super Magic for every 100 gold you have.
Super Magic X: Consume 50 gold coins to deal 5 damage to all enemies.

Name: 恶魔契约
Description:
这张卡每使用一次，获得一点超魔。
超魔X：重复X次：50%概率增加20%金币，反之失去10%金币,受到10%最大生命值的真实伤害。
Description_en:
Each time this card is used, gain 1 Super Magic.
Super Magic X: Repeat X times: 50% chance to gain 20% gold coins, otherwise lose 10% gold coins and take 10% of your maximum health as true damage.
Reverse.

Name: 汰换
Description:
燃烬两张手牌,
将三张稀有度不低于三的随机卡牌加入牌堆顶部。并抽取{0}张卡牌。
Description_en:
Burnout two cards from your hand,
Add three random cards with a rarity of at least three to the top of your deck. Draw {0} cards.

Name: 迷梦
Description: 每次抽到时，这张卡的打出效果变成一张稀有度在3-5的技能牌（费用不变）。
Description_en: Each time this card is drawn, its play effect becomes a skill card with a rarity of 3-5 (cost remains unchanged).

Name: 命运之线
Description: 下次数字骰额外投掷一次，结果为两者之和。
Description_en: The next time a number is rolled, roll again and add the results together.

Name: 后悔药
Description: 下次检定骰的结果变为两次取低。
Description_en: The next time a check is made, take the lower of the two results.

Name: 破财消灾
Description:
每有一百金币，获得一点超魔。
超魔X：获得X层强韧。
Name_en: Break the bank to avoid disaster
Description_en:
For every 100 gold coins, gain 1 Super Magic.
Super Magic X: Gain X layers of {buff_resilient}.
